# Annandale North (ward)

|elects_howmany=4
|councillor1=Stephen Thompson
|party1=Scottish National Party
|councillor2=Gail MacGregor
|party2=Scottish Conservative and Unionist Party
|councillor3=Lynne Davis
|party3=Scottish Conservative and Unionist Party
|councillor4=Carolyne Wilson
|party4=Scottish Labour Party
|towns=LockerbieMoffat
|scot_parl=Dumfriesshire
|scot_region=South Scotland
|westminster=Dumfriesshire, Clydesdale and Tweeddale
}}
Annandale North is one of the thirteen wards used to elect members of the Dumfries and Galloway Council. It elects four Councillors.
